      • setSyncMethods

        public void setSyncMethods(Token t,
                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                           boolean loggedIn)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        This method calls different threads to start the synchronisation process. For every softwareName a different thread will be started
        Parameters:
        t - Token object of the current user
        req - HttpServletRequest
        loggedIn - true if user is logged in
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - createDatabaseConnection exception
